subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Justin Leonard is in the top 10 money winners on the PGA Tour, 27th in the world rankings, and looking to earn his way back to the Ryder Cup team for the first time since 1999.
snippet: Justin Leonard is in the top 10 money winners on the PGA Tour, 27th in the world rankings, and looking to earn his way back to the Ryder Cup team for the first time since 1999.
